attributes.action: Offer tax incentives to companies who offer home working options.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this day of sophisticated telecoms offering home working opportunities, as well as being potentially cost effective for businesses, by reducing premise costs, allows workers a better life balance, and importantly reduces traffic congestion and therefore is environmentally friendly and in my view  is a more positive way of tackling these issues than toll taxes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
